column2: start_year - first year of model run
elapsed_year - elapsed year of model run
ncov - the number of coverage types included in the model
ngrid - number of ICM-LAVegMod grid cells - will be an array dimension for all grid-level data
ncomp - number of ICM-Hydro compartmenets - will be an array dimension for all compartment-level data
grid_res - XY resolution of ICM-LAVegMod grid (meters) - only applicable for regular Cartesian grid
dem_res - XY resolution of DEM (meters)
grid_file - csv with X and Y coordinates (UTM meters) of grid cell centroids and the grid cell area (sq meters)
build_neighbors - flag - set to 1 if near and nearest neighbor lists need to be built from Grid XY data
column3: set to 0 if neighbor files already exist

column2: nearest_neighbors_file - text file with list of grid cells that are the defined nearest neighbors
nearest_neighbors_dist - distance in which a neighboring grid cell is considered a nearest neighbor (meters) *must be smaller magnitude than "near_neighbor_dist"*
near_neighbors_file -  text file with list of grid cells that are the defined near neighbors
near_neighbors_dist - distance in which a neighboring grid cell is considered a near neighbor (meters) *must be larger magnitude than "nearest_neighbor_dist"*
max_neighbors - maximum number of grid cells that will be allowed in the near and nearest neighbor lists - this will be the number of columns in the neighbor files
coverage_attribute_file - file name
column4: to csv with model attributes for each coverage type - this file row-order must match the column-order of veg_in_file

column2: veg_in_file - file name with relative path to *vegty.asc+ file saved by ICM-LAVegMod
hydro_comp_out_file - file name
column4: to compartment_out.csv from current model year's ICM-Hydro simulation

column2: morph_grid_out_file - file name
column4: to grid_data.csv file from previous model year's ICM-Morph simulation

column2: veg_out_file - file name with relative path to *vegty.asc+ file saved by ICM-LAVegMod
veg_summary_out_file - file name with relative path to *veg_summary.csv file for current year written to disk for final landscape of the current model year
file naming convention prefix
